author: AleArriaza
title: ...not so much
text:
I stayed there with my wife for two nights.
Room was ok, place was cool, the hotel has a nice mood going on; BUT, staff was not friendly at all. Specially after they told me about all this "extra" fees, and "hidden fees for credit ....crap" I had to pay at the moment I was checking in. That is not cool, we just needed a place to sleep, probably have breakfast...and they were charging us credit in advance just in case we wanted to consume their stuff (if we didnt used the credit, on that exact day, we lose it... yeah, they charged it every day of our stay".
Overall... there are MANY other places you can stay in NY, and avoid all this nonesense.
